mn64:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn64:2.1: “dharetha no tumhe, bhikkhave, maya desitani pancorambhagiyani samyojanani”ti?
mn64:2.2: Evam vutte, ayasma malukyaputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn64:2.3: “aham kho, bhante, dharemi bhagavata desitani pancorambhagiyani samyojanani”ti.
mn64:2.4: “Yatha katham pana tvam, malukyaputta, dharesi maya desitani pancorambhagiyani samyojanani”ti?
mn64:2.5: “Sakkayaditthim kho aham, bhante, bhagavata orambhagiyam samyojanam desitam dharemi;
mn64:2.6: vicikiccham kho aham, bhante, bhagavata orambhagiyam samyojanam desitam dharemi;
mn64:2.7: silabbataparamasam kho aham, bhante, bhagavata orambhagiyam samyojanam desitam dharemi;
mn64:2.8: kamacchandam kho aham, bhante, bhagavata orambhagiyam samyojanam desitam dharemi;
mn64:2.9: byapadam kho aham, bhante, bhagavata orambhagiyam samyojanam desitam dharemi.
mn64:2.10: Evam kho aham, bhante, dharemi bhagavata desitani pancorambhagiyani samyojanani”ti.
mn64:3.1: “Kassa kho nama tvam, malukyaputta, imani evam pancorambhagiyani samyojanani desitani dharesi?
mn64:3.2: Nanu, malukyaputta, annatitthiya paribbajaka imina tarunupamena uparambhena uparambhissanti?
mn64:3.3: Daharassa hi, malukyaputta, kumarassa mandassa uttanaseyyakassa sakkayotipi na hoti, kuto panassa uppajjissati sakkayaditthi?
mn64:3.5: Daharassa hi, malukyaputta, kumarassa mandassa uttanaseyyakassa dhammatipi na hoti, kuto panassa uppajjissati dhammesu vicikiccha?
mn64:3.7: Daharassa hi, malukyaputta, kumarassa mandassa uttanaseyyakassa silatipi na hoti, kuto panassa uppajjissati silesu silabbataparamaso?
mn64:3.9: Daharassa hi, malukyaputta, kumarassa mandassa uttanaseyyakassa kamatipi na hoti, kuto panassa uppajjissati kamesu kamacchando?
mn64:3.11: Daharassa hi, malukyaputta, kumarassa mandassa uttanaseyyakassa sattatipi na hoti, kuto panassa uppajjissati sattesu byapado?
mn64:3.13: Nanu, malukyaputta, annatitthiya paribbajaka imina tarunupamena uparambhena uparambhissanti”ti?
mn64:4.1: Evam vutte, ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn64:4.3: yam bhagava pancorambhagiyani samyojanani deseyya. Bhagavato sutva bhikkhu dharessanti”ti.
mn64:4.4: “Tena hananda, sunahi, sadhukam manasi karohi; bhasissami”ti.
mn64:4.5: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
mn64:5.1: “Idhananda, assutava puthujjano ariyanam adassavi ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinito, sappurisanam adassavi sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinito
mn64:5.3: uppannaya ca sakkayaditthiya nissaranam yathabhutam nappajanati.
mn64:5.4: Tassa sa sakkayaditthi thamagata appativinita orambhagiyam samyojanam.
mn64:5.6: uppannaya ca vicikicchaya nissaranam yathabhutam nappajanati.
mn64:5.7: Tassa sa vicikiccha thamagata appativinita orambhagiyam samyojanam.
mn64:5.9: uppannassa ca silabbataparamasassa nissaranam yathabhutam nappajanati.
mn64:5.10: Tassa so silabbataparamaso thamagato appativinito orambhagiyam samyojanam.
mn64:5.12: uppannassa ca kamaragassa nissaranam yathabhutam nappajanati.
mn64:5.13: Tassa so kamarago thamagato appativinito orambhagiyam samyojanam.
mn64:5.15: uppannassa ca byapadassa nissaranam yathabhutam nappajanati.
mn64:5.16: Tassa so byapado thamagato appativinito orambhagiyam samyojanam.
mn64:6.1: Sutava ca kho, ananda, ariyasavako ariyanam dassavi ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinito, sappurisanam dassavi sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinito na sakkayaditthipariyutthitena cetasa viharati na sakkayaditthiparetena;
mn64:6.2: uppannaya ca sakkayaditthiya nissaranam yathabhutam pajanati.
mn64:6.4: Na vicikicchapariyutthitena cetasa viharati na vicikicchaparetena;
mn64:6.5: uppannaya ca vicikicchaya nissaranam yathabhutam pajanati.
mn64:6.7: Na silabbataparamasapariyutthitena cetasa viharati na silabbataparamasaparetena;
mn64:6.8: uppannassa ca silabbataparamasassa nissaranam yathabhutam pajanati.
mn64:6.10: Na kamaragapariyutthitena cetasa viharati na kamaragaparetena;
mn64:6.11: uppannassa ca kamaragassa nissaranam yathabhutam pajanati.
mn64:6.13: Na byapadapariyutthitena cetasa viharati na byapadaparetena;
mn64:6.14: uppannassa ca byapadassa nissaranam yathabhutam pajanati.
mn64:6.16: Yo, ananda, maggo ya patipada pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam pahanaya tam maggam tam patipadam anagamma pancorambhagiyani samyojanani nassati va dakkhati va pajahissati vati—netam thanam vijjati.
mn64:6.17: Seyyathapi, ananda, mahato rukkhassa titthato saravato tacam acchetva pheggum acchetva saracchedo bhavissatiti—
mn64:6.19: evameva kho, ananda, yo maggo ya patipada pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam pahanaya tam maggam tam patipadam anagamma pancorambhagiyani samyojanani nassati va dakkhati va pajahissati vati—netam thanam vijjati.
mn64:7.1: Yo ca kho, ananda, maggo ya patipada pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam pahanaya tam maggam tam patipadam agamma pancorambhagiyani samyojanani nassati va dakkhati va pajahissati vati—thanametam vijjati.
mn64:8.1: Seyyathapi, ananda, mahato rukkhassa titthato saravato tacam chetva pheggum chetva saracchedo bhavissatiti—thanametam vijjati.
mn64:8.2: evameva kho, ananda, yo maggo ya patipada pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam pahanaya tam maggam tam patipadam agamma pancorambhagiyani samyojanani nassati va dakkhati va pajahissati vati—thanametam vijjati.
mn64:8.3: Seyyathapi, ananda, ganga nadi pura udakassa samatittika kakapeyya.
mn64:8.5: ‘aham imissa gangaya nadiya tiriyam bahaya sotam chetva sotthina param gacchissami’ti;
mn64:8.6: so na sakkuneyya gangaya nadiya tiriyam bahaya sotam chetva sotthina param gantum.
mn64:8.7: Evameva kho, ananda, yesam kesanci sakkayanirodhaya dhamme desiyamane cittam na pakkhandati nappasidati na santitthati na vimuccati;
mn64:8.8: seyyathapi so dubbalako puriso evamete datthabba.
mn64:8.9: Seyyathapi, ananda, ganga nadi pura udakassa samatittika kakapeyya.
mn64:8.11: ‘aham imissa gangaya nadiya tiriyam bahaya sotam chetva sotthina param gacchissami’ti;
mn64:8.12: so sakkuneyya gangaya nadiya tiriyam bahaya sotam chetva sotthina param gantum.
mn64:8.13: Evameva kho, ananda, yesam kesanci sakkayanirodhaya dhamme desiyamane cittam pakkhandati pasidati santitthati vimuccati;
mn64:8.14: seyyathapi so balava puriso evamete datthabba.
mn64:9.1: Katamo cananda, maggo, katama patipada pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam pahanaya?
mn64:9.2: Idhananda, bhikkhu upadhiviveka akusalanam dhammanam pahana sabbaso kayadutthullanam patippassaddhiya vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
mn64:9.3: So yadeva tattha hoti rupagatam vedanagatam sannagatam sankharagatam vinnanagatam te dhamme aniccato dukkhato rogato gandato sallato aghato abadhato parato palokato sunnato anattato samanupassati.
mn64:9.5: So tehi dhammehi cittam pativapetva amataya dhatuya cittam upasamharati:
mn64:9.6: ‘etam santam etam panitam yadidam sabbasankharasamatho sabbupadhipatinissaggo tanhakkhayo virago nirodho nibbanan’ti.
mn64:9.7: So tattha thito asavanam khayam papunati;
mn64:9.8: no ce asavanam khayam papunati teneva dhammaragena taya dhammanandiya pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya opapatiko hoti, tattha parinibbayi, anavattidhammo tasma loka.
mn64:9.9: Ayampi kho, ananda, maggo ayam patipada pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam pahanaya.
mn64:10-12.1: Puna caparam, ananda, bhikkhu vitakkavicaranam vupasama …pe… dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati …pe…
mn64:10-12.4: So yadeva tattha hoti rupagatam vedanagatam sannagatam sankharagatam vinnanagatam …
mn64:10-12.7: Ayampi kho, ananda, maggo ayam patipada pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam pahanaya.
mn64:13.1: Puna caparam, ananda, bhikkhu sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama patighasannanam atthangama nanattasannanam amanasikara ‘ananto akaso’ti akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
mn64:13.2: So yadeva tattha hoti vedanagatam sannagatam sankharagatam vinnanagatam …
mn64:13.5: Ayampi kho, ananda, maggo ayam patipada pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam pahanaya.
mn64:14.1: Puna caparam, ananda, bhikkhu sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘anantam vinnanan’ti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
mn64:14.2: So yadeva tattha hoti vedanagatam sannagatam sankharagatam vinnanagatam …
mn64:14.5: Ayampi kho, ananda, maggo ayam patipada pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam pahanaya.
mn64:15.1: Puna caparam, ananda, bhikkhu sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
mn64:15.2: So yadeva tattha hoti vedanagatam sannagatam sankharagatam vinnanagatam …
mn64:15.5: Ayampi kho, ananda, maggo ayam patipada pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam pahanaya”ti.
mn64:16.1: “Eso ce, bhante, maggo esa patipada pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam pahanaya, atha kincarahi idhekacce bhikkhu cetovimuttino ekacce bhikkhu pannavimuttino”ti?
mn64:16.4: Attamano ayasma anando bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
